title: Detective Conan: Shadows of Deceit
premise: In the dark alleys of London, a deadly robbery leads to the unexpected murder of a notorious drug dealer. Detective Conan embarks on a perilous journey to unravel the mystery behind the violent night, facing dangerous criminals and unexpected twists.

shotlist.description: A quiet, eerie night scene showing a residential area in north London, setting a tense atmosphere.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A suburb at night, dimly lit streets with fog, a hint of suspense in the air, dark color tones.

voice_over.text: A silent night shattered by greed...

shotlist.description: A group of shadowy figures, armed and masked, quietly approaching a house, creating a sense of impending danger.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Shadowy figures in dark clothing, masks, moving stealthily towards a suburban house, night time, tense atmosphere.

voice_over.text: Their target: a man with secrets.

shotlist.description: Interior shot of a man, Olsi Kuka, sleeping in his bed, unaware of the danger approaching.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Interior of a bedroom, man sleeping peacefully, room dimly lit by a night lamp, suspenseful atmosphere.

voice_over.text: Unaware of the nightmare that awaits.

shotlist.description: Sudden chaos as the robbers break in and attack, the scene is fast-paced and violent.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Action-packed scene of robbers breaking through a door, attacking a man in his bed, quick motions, dramatic lighting.

shotlist.description: Conan examining the crime scene, looking for clues, his expression serious and focused.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Young detective examining a crime scene, focusing on details, wearing gloves, a magnifying glass in hand, thoughtful expression.

shotlist.description: Flashback to the trial in court, showing the accused robbers looking defiant and unrepentant.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Courtroom scene, accused individuals standing, defiant expressions, a judge and jury in the background, tense atmosphere.

shotlist.description: Conan and Heiji discussing the case, exchanging theories and pointing at a wall full of crime photos and notes.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Two young detectives discussing intensely in front of a wall covered in crime scene photos and notes, pointing at details, determined expressions.

shotlist.description: A tense confrontation between Conan and the mastermind behind the robbery, hints of danger.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Intense face-off between a young detective and a criminal mastermind in a dark, moody setting, suspenseful atmosphere.

voice_over.text: Behind the shadows, lies deeper darkness.

shotlist.description: A chase scene, Conan running after a suspect through the bustling streets of London, high energy and fast-paced.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Young detective chasing a suspect through crowded city streets, dynamic motion, blurred background to emphasize speed.

shotlist.description: Climactic scene with Conan setting a trap for the criminals, using his gadgets and intellect.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Young detective setting a sophisticated trap with gadgets, focused expression, in a dimly lit room, tension in the air.

shotlist.description: Dramatic reveal as the true motives of the criminals are uncovered, Conan explains the connections with evidence in hand.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Revealing moment, young detective holding up evidence, explaining, criminals reacting in shock, dramatic lighting.

shotlist.description: The final face-off, Conan confronts the main antagonist, the tension is palpable.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Final showdown, young detective facing off against a criminal mastermind, intense expressions, dramatic, suspenseful setting.

shotlist.description: The aftermath, police arriving at the scene, criminals being arrested, Conan watching solemnly.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Aftermath of a crime scene, police cars and officers, criminals being handcuffed, young detective watching the scene, night setting.

voice_over.text: In the shadows of deceit, justice finds a way.

shotlist.description: Closing shot of Conan walking away from the crime scene, his silhouette against the city lights, hinting at future mysteries.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Silhouette of a young detective walking away, city lights in the background, moody and contemplative atmosphere.

voice_over.text: The city sleeps tonight, but evil never rests...
